title: Forescout eyeInspect for OT Security
descriptionMarkdown: Forescout eyeInspect for OT Security connector allows you to connect Asset/Alert information from Forescout eyeInspect OT platform with Microsoft Sentinel, to view and analyze data using Log Analytics Tables and Workbooks. This gives you more insight into OT organization network and improves security operation capabilities.

dataTypes.name: ForescoutOtAsset_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutOtAsset_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ForescoutOtAlert_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ForescoutOtAsset_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

ForescoutOtAlert_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).
